name: Ms.Lakshmi Kalpana Roy K
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - The Gandhigram Rural Institute, Deemed University   - 2000M.Sc  ( Information Technology )  - The Gandhigram Rural Institute, Deemed University   - 2002
in_brief: Ms. K. Lakshmi Kalpan Roy joined the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences in June 2023 as Assistant Professor (Sr. Gr.).  She has more than 19 years of experience in teaching. Currently she teaches Social Network Data Analytics.

publications.journal: A webinar series on MINDS’24 (Math for Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
